description: React component 'Discover' that fetches and displays a list of videos from an AWS Lambda-backed API. Implements data normalization, placeholder asset handling, and renders a grid of FilmCard components with loading and error states.

methods.name: Discover()
methods.description: Main React functional component that fetches video data from an API and displays it in a grid with placeholders and state handling.

methods.name: safeJsonParse(text)
methods.description: Utility function that safely parses a JSON string into an object, returning an empty object upon failure.

methods.name: pickPreviewImage
methods.description: Function that selects an appropriate preview image for a film, falling back to placeholders if necessary.
